attributes.action: Ammend the London Low Emmisions Zone for Charitable and Volunteer Sector Vehicle Operators
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Mayor of London has introduced the London Low Emmision Zone with no or little thought as to the massive and detrimental impact this will have on the Chartity and Volunteer/Community Sector. The costs involved will do irrepairable harm to them. We urgently DEMAND that the Prime Minister Interfere and force the Mayor to Introduce a clause of Exemption for this vital group of operators.
